oneClick.title: One-Click Addition

smart.title: Smart Detection
smart.description: Powered by Kuromoji.js for accurate morphological analysis of Japanese text.

standardHtml.title: Standard HTML

native.title: Native Integration
native.description: Seamlessly integrated into WordPress Gutenberg editor. Works with Paragraph and Heading blocks.

performance.title: Fast Performance
performance.description: Client-side processing with intelligent caching. No impact on your site's front-end speed.

steps.title: How It Works
steps.subtitle: Three simple steps to add furigana to your content

step1.title: Select Text
step1.description: Highlight the Japanese text you want to add furigana to in the Gutenberg editor

step2.title: Click Button
step2.description: Click the furigana button in the toolbar - it's that simple

step3.title: Done!
step3.description: Furigana is automatically added to all kanji in your selection
